Pre-Game Insights: Zimbabwe do not have a good record against Afghanistan. We expect the trend to continue.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at the Harare Sports Club, Harare is a balanced pitch.
The pacers have earned 78% of the total bowling fantasy points at this venue.
Others: In their last 5 games, Afghanistan have won 2 games and lost 3. In their last 5 games, Zimbabwe have won 2 games and lost 3.
Both teams last played against each other in the Match 9 of the ICC World Twenty20, 2016
